title: Teacher Professional Learning Design Utilizing Web 2.0 Technologies

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary digital literacy and understanding of primary education methodologies
context.additional_context: Mixed group of pre-service and in-service elementary teachers. Emphasizes competency in utilizing Web 2.0 tools in smartphone-centric, limited technological environments.

learning_goals: Learners can build collaborative learning networks with peer educators using Web 2.0 technologies (blogs, wikis, social bookmarks, etc.)
Learners can systematically analyze and improve their teaching practices through Web 2.0-based reflective journaling
Learners can apply Web 2.0-integrated lesson designs—developed through project-based assessments—to actual classroom settings

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
